00021 template <typename N, typename P>
00022 class TokenizerImpl {
00023  private:
00024   std::vector<Dictionary *>              dic_;
00025   Dictionary                             unkdic_;
00026   scoped_string                          bos_feature_;
00027   scoped_string                          unk_feature_;

00035   size_t                                 max_grouping_size_;

00038 
00039  public:
00040 
00041   inline N *getNewNode() {
00042     N *node = node_freelist_.alloc();
00043     std::memset(node, 0, sizeof(N));
00044     node->id = id_++;
00045     return node;
00046   }
00047 
00048   N *getBOSNode();
00049   N *getEOSNode();
00050 
00051   N *lookup(const char *begin, const char *end);
00052 
00053   bool open(const Param &);
00054   void close();

00056 
00057   const DictionaryInfo *dictionary_info() const;
00058 
00059   const char *what() { return what_.str(); }
00060 
00061   explicit TokenizerImpl();
00062   virtual ~TokenizerImpl() { this->close(); }
00063 };
